response.original_title: Shimmer And Shine: Dance Like A Genie
response.overview: Learn Dance Magic to recover enchanted dance shoes from Zeta, join the genies'first dance adventure when they bring ballet to Leah's backyard and boogie at Princess Samira's magical masquerade party!  Includes:  2 Double-length episodes: Dance Magic (Featuring the Butterfly Dance), Backyard Ballet  Plus!  Nazboo's Magic Kazoo  Masquerade Charade  Grab That Gem  Carpet Trouble
response.title: Shimmer And Shine: Dance Like A Genie
